author: Al Jazeera
title: Where are the US coronavirus hot spots?
description: As New York continues its fight against the deadly virus, officials are concerned about other population centres.
content:
New York remains the epicentre for coronavirus cases in the United States with more than 1,500 deaths and over 38,000 confirmed cases, but experts warn many other cities and states are quickly becoming hot spots for the outbreak.
